column2: WE ARE OVERHERE! HURRY UP WILL YOU. NUMBER THREE IS NOT DOING SO GREAT.
GOT THAT. JUST A MOMENT WE WILL CLEAR THE TENTS OUT SO NO TRACES OF OUR PRESENCE ARE LEFT TO THE ENEMY.
OKAY WE ARE READY TO LEAVE THIS STINKING FOREST. JUST LEAD THE WAY CHIEF.
LIGHTS OUT, WEAPONS CHECK. WE ARE ENTERING TO ENEMY TERRITORY.
WE ARE SAFELY BACK IN FRIENDLY TERRITORY.
ROGER THAT CHARLIE ON MY WAY. BRAVO OUT.
THIS IS BRAVO. READY FOR NURSERY PICKUP. GATHER UP KIDDIES, TIME TO GO HOME. BRAVO OUT.
OKAY BOYS. GET YOUR THINGS AND LETS GET OUT OF HERE.
CHARLIE TO BRAVO. HUNGRY YUNGSTERS NEED A RIDE HOME. OVER.
GODDAMN. RUSSIAN PATROL! HURRY UP. EVERYBODY GET IN THE CHOPPER NOW! MOVE YOUR ASS! GO GO GO!
